column4: I heard you can use ftp and send a file in your public dir.  My vsftpd is on.  Have been researching how to use ftp
are you running a ssh server?
no
no
i would have said just sFTP into it if you were :|
does the ftp acc have access to your website document directory
and does it have RWX rights to it?
not a website, i set the permissions to chomod 777
best way is to try it and see if it throws a error.
have you ever used it?
the dameon, no. i perfer to use sFTP even though its inside a locked up network >:3
Guest32249, if you would like
Its not manditory, it will use kernel 3.*.*.
Guest32249, what are you running now?
Ah
Guest32249, I would be too, but my video card dosent work with it O.o
I know you set it to work in /var/vsftpd.conf.  I have a file in /var/ftp/pub
test it, it should work.
Im not good with vsftp as i just login as root over SFTP :p
I'm more of a ssh person.. mabey someone else can provide better help
Iam just trying to figure out how to fire it up in the command line
thanks
no problem :P
